components.text:
An artifact of unknown origin, theorized to be a dessert item crafted by an entity with mastery over both pastry and spacetime.
This chocolate bar phases in and out of local reality, occasionally vanishing entirelyâ€”presumably consumed in another dimension. Attempts to eat it have failed. $(c:red)$(b)Spectacularly$().

Its surface remains flawlessly smooth and pristine, as if hand-tempered by the universe's finest chocolatier.

$(u)$(c:#fffc00)Do not bite$(). You may lose more than your teeth.

(This item is legally considered a Class-3 Existential Hazard.)

'Filed under anomaly $(b)047-B$(/b) by the $(c:blue)Catalyst Control Authority$(/c)'
